text:
@britbazza3 @MarkAvery @WWTconservation @RSPBEngland @RSPBScience @foodgov @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @pow_rebecca So, lead is not poisonous in its solid state you assert? Only when dissolved ( the word I believe you were attempting to use) you say?

Why, then, have lead pipes been systematically replaced in our water supply? And why do so many water fowl die from ingesting lead shot?
